dcterms:creator: X. Zhang
L. Yin
J. F. Cohn
S. Canavan
M. Reale
A. Horowitz
P. Liu
dcterms:description: BP4D contains 2D and 3D facial expression data of 41 young adult subjects, including 18 male and 23 female. Each subject participated in 8 tasks, each of which corresponds to a specific expression. There are totally 146,847 face images with labeled AUs.
dcterms:title: BP4D

dcterms:creator: S. M. Mavadati
M. H. Mahoor
K. Bartlett
P. Trinh
J. F. Cohn
dcterms:description: DISFA contains stereo videos of 27 subjects with different ethnicity. There are totally 130,815 frame images, each of which is labeled with intensities from 0-5.
dcterms:title: DISFA
